title: antharanga bhakthi
sahitya:
antaranga bhakti tandu enai ALayyA arashE nin ponnaDikku aDimai nAn uyya







anupallavi







sundarAnga su-GAngEya marakatAnga mayUra vara turanga







caraNam







un mukham nOkkum kaNNoLi aruL nI SaNmata sammata SaDvidhamArgiNi

mukkaNNan aruL SaNmukha kaNmaNi nal vaNNakkavi kunjaradAsan en kaN nI
